attributes.action: Commence recovery of the remains of British dead in War Graves Commission sites in the Middle East.
attributes.additional_details: It is inevitable that there will be a complete breakdown of order in Islamic countries in the ME and War Graves in those countries - and their contents - will be subject to the most obscene defilation - ALL BEING SHOWN IN FULL GRAPHIC DETAIL ON TWITTER AND YOUTUBE.  Action must be taken NOW to recover and repatriate the remains of British forces sacrificed during futile political escapades of the past, to give them the protection to which they are entitled.
